content.prompt: Which of the following aspects of life in the United States in the early nineteenth century most likely influenced Adamsâ€™ recollection of Revolutionary events?

choices.label: The rapid development of the market revolution
The development of a national culture and national identity
The growing popularity of the idea of Manifest Destiny
The rapid growth of a mass democracy

topic.text: 4.9: The Development of an American Culture

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Identify  a source's point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience.
